name: Manuj
p1_desc: It was Manuj's first day at BITS Pilani along with a thousand more. Little did they know that this place would create the greatest memories of their lifetime!
p2_desc: And since then, their journey at BITS has been somewhat adventurous. But life does not give you the ability to just stick to one thing. As time passes, we must move on...
shortText2: And so to say all of us...
